website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for anyone who wants moist heat from a reusable heating pad but doesn't want to go electric.
pros: A simple, moist heat treatment that can be used on the go
Ideal if you need only occasional relief from cramps or spasms
cons: Not big enough for larger pain areas
There have been reports of holes appearing and the beads spilling out

customer_reviews.title: THERMALON Leaked
customer_reviews.text: My first Thermalon lasted several years before developing a leak (an excellent tim period) sending microbeads all over the inside of the microwave and floor.The next one lasted 3 days before microbeads spilled all over. Returned to Amazon for replacement. The replacement Thermalon was fine for a little over a month (Amazon Return Period) before leak appeared. Leakage began when microwave was set for 1.6 minutes. I don't know what has changed in the manufacturing process but obviously that is a problem with quality control. Probably my last Thermalon as cleaning up leaked microbeads is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: emkay

customer_reviews.title: Potentially dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Melted and started a fire in my microwave. It's possible it s because my microwave is small and the pad touched the wall of microwave but just be aware this can happen.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie10021

customer_reviews.title: Holes within a week
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about a week and liked it fine, but today when I took it out of the microwave, beads started falling all over. Suddenly it has several holes right through the main cover, almost like it melted. I did not microwave it for too long, did not use it incorrectly, followed all instructions; it's just a product that is not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst. I ordered two of them
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst. I ordered two of them, and both of them have exploded. I follow the heating instructions carefully, yet they each exploded one week after using it. I will NOT buy this again and do not recommend it for anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality wasted bucks
customer_reviews.text: I followed every instruction never heated more than 2 minutes. Kept it clean. Return window closed January 31 today it blew a hole. Another one I bought in December did the same thing. I had an old one that lasted 5 years and never did anything like this. I got rid of it solely because of age. My wife needs a good heat pack because of back issues but I will not waste any more money with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Strahan

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I place this under a pillowcase for my young foster kittens. This is great because you can choose the temperature that can work for different situations. The babies love it and so do I :) Update 12.30.2017 A couple months ago I went to heat this up and when I went to grab for it my wet finger (I had just finished washing kitten bottles) poked right through it. The tiny beads inside stuck to my fingers and I received many burns and blisters on my right hand. I would not recommend using this item as it can be incredibly dangerous, glad that I was the only one burned and not the baby kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: It BROKE within a WEEK.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviews, but I was hoping those were just the odd cases out. I microwaved this only a handful of times, not in a particularly strong microwave, and always for under the maximum amount of time. Still, the third or fourth time I used it the microwave burned a hole through the fabric. When I went to take it out, 10,000 tiny beads spilled all over the kitchen. I spent about an hour on my hands and knees trying to pick them all up so my pets wouldn't eat them. Total waste of time and money. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Love this heating pad!
customer_reviews.text: Love these heat pads. I have been a fan of the neck wrap by Thermalon for years, but decided to try this pad since it is larger. This is a wonderful product. It is easy to use, microwaves fast for moist heat, and lasts a decent amount of time. I use it for stomach aches or when I need heat for pain relief from sore muscles. The pad is adaptable and will mold around your leg or knee just as easily as it can be used flat for your back or abdomen. My last one (the neck wrap) lasted for over 2 years with regular use before I needed a new one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sixtus

customer_reviews.title: I followed the instructions that said not to exceed 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions that said not to exceed 2 minutes and 30 seconds. This pad did not warm enough. The description says it provides 30minutes of moist heat. I did not find this to be true. This company does not accepts returns. I will use my dry heating pad. This provides constant heat.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: I love these heating pads but this must be a defective lot...
customer_reviews.text: holes developed in all three heating pads! I love these heating pads, especially after a rigorous workout. I ordered 3 from Amazon because I was too lazy to drive to Walmart - MISTAKE! all 3 have developed holes, leaking hundreds (and hundreds) of microbeads everywhere (try getting them all; it is near impossible!)
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Apostle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely incredible! Lasts so long.
customer_reviews.text: These heating packs are unbelievably awesome. They all last at least 30 min with hot moist heat. I’ve found these to be the most effective type of heating pack. I own both the shoulder/back one, the neck one, and the eye one and all are so reliable. My muscles loosen up quick with the moist heat. It’s almost like a fuse between a hot bath and a heating pad. But better. HIGHLY recommended. Good for both stress relief, for warming up your body before physical activities, and for achy or sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Grablachoff

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks now and I really like it. I haven't had any problems with it getting over heated in the microwave. The most I can heat it is for 1.5 minutes in my microwave or its too hot to put against my skin. The pad had dividers sewn to keep the 'hot beads' from falling to one side. Glad to have purchased this. I will update if I end up having problems after all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Useful Microwave Heat Pad
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. It holds the heat for about 15 - 20 minutes, which is about what I need. I use it with a TENS machine or sometimes by itself. It holds its shape fairly well, but also is soft enough with enough give to conform to a knee or something like that. I've found it to be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: reesah mouse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pad for aches and pains. I have CT and really struggled to get to sleep at night. After a little reading, I purchased wrist braces to stabilize my wrists at night and decided to buy one of these heat packs for my shoulders. When I go to bed, I put on my braces and then heat this up and place it under my shoulders. Huge improvement in sleep quality!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product! Hot or cold. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why so many reviewed this product poorly due to burning in the microwave. Microwaves’ power varies, so start at 1 minute and work up to no greater than 2 1/2 minutes. Can also put this in the freezer. Wish it was prettier, but it is high quality which is what matters. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: hlsanford

customer_reviews.title: Needs cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this for back ache. It's nicer than the rice ones holds heat a long time and just a perfect size. Tell thermalon however they need to make washable cover for it or make it in some dark color, regular use made exterior look shoddy white surface gray and pilling. I sewed little mini pillow cases out of a supersoft fleece blanket and voila ! it makes it absolutely wonderful .
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long before beads come out
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 7 months. Worked great but feel it should have lasted longer followed directions on use to the letter. The last one I had from a different manufacturer worked for years before the beads came out. The reason I bought this one was couldn’t find my old one that lasted forever 😞. And the tear or whatever is inside the little pocket so can’t even try to repair 😡
customer_reviews.author: Maria E

customer_reviews.title: I really like these moist heat packs
customer_reviews.text: I really like these moist heat packs. They stay hot and most for a descent amount of time. When it tells you not to heat beyond the recommended time, definitely follow the rule. I accidentally overheated mine and it melted in one spot and beads spilled out all over. It wasn't the manufacturers fault and the product wasn't defective. It is such a good product that I purchased two more heat packs.
customer_reviews.author: heart on fire

customer_reviews.title: Not a true hydroculator
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed this is not a true hydroculator which has moist heat. It’s simply a heating pad you heat up in the microwave. We can always use another heating pad, so I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Mine's lasted FOUR years and NO problem : )
customer_reviews.text: Mine has been great but I just fried it. Had taken glass turn style out of microwave for cleaning so dummy me, turnstyle wasn't rotating! I did read reviewers saying their pads got holes from microwave. That's how I got mine. My microwave is 1000 watts and it warms pad up nicely. Believe it or not, when it's bed time and bed is freezing, I pop this baby under the covers where my feet go. It's heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: A. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a little while then melted
customer_reviews.text: This worked quite well for about a month. I have used maybe 10x and the beads melted right through the fabric. Had a mess all over. Left the size of a quarter in the fabric with the heads melted to the sides. I used the recommended heating time as well. Sad because I was in need of the pad for my back after back surgery.
customer_reviews.author: yogi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use heating pack
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a moist heating pad and this is so easy to use. One and a half minutes in the microwave and it lasts a good 30 minutes of warmth. It’s sturdy and well sewn. There is a pocket for your hands or feet if you wish. My only complaint is it is stuffed fairly full so it can’t be folded or bent around any joints easily. It’s basically for backs necks shoulders and in tops of a knee. It would not wrap around a wrist or an ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Becca129a

customer_reviews.title: Not washable as I wanted to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it works wonderful, but it said it was washable. My idea of washable is being able to throw the cover in the washing machine and wipe down the heating element w bleach. I wanted to use this with patients since we lost our hot pack machine. But as we all know, being able to wipe away germs is top priority. And I can’t afford to buy every patient who needs one their own ....
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Inferior to rice packs.
customer_reviews.text: The cover does not hold up to frequent use. It pills and feels more like paper than fabric. The silicone beads do not produce as much moist heat as a rice pack. And the heat does not last as long. Next time will buy another rice pack. More moist heat and more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Les Raymond

customer_reviews.title: ... apparently it decided to get too hot and these stupid little beads went all over the place
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these a couploe of years ago and it always went in the microwave but apparently it decided to get too hot and these stupid little beads went all over the place. But because it lasted as long as it did we decided to buy it again. Well, we have been using it for less than 2 months and it burst open and is useless.. I won't buy it again. What a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Laferriere

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pocket, where you can put your hands and move it easily. You control the temperature according to the time you put it in the microwave, which is great. The little beads it is made of gives it flexibility, allowing it to be place on not flat surfaces, like the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya O.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great product.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these many years ago (10+). It has been through a lot of use and began to become worn out. We purchased these from amazon using the part number off the old one and we were very happy with the results. About 2 minutes in the microwave and you have moist warm heat for sore muscles and aches.
customer_reviews.author: Lou T

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ever. I deal with Neurapathy in my feet due to damaged nerves, plus have Fibromyalgia which cause a lot of muscle spasms in my feet when the get cold, which is a lot. Especially at night under the covers. With this, all I have to do is heat it up for about 45 seconds to make it warm enough to heat up my bed where my feet go without making it to hot. Helps keep my feet from getting muscle spasms. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective pain relief product.
customer_reviews.text: Great products, we have several styles. Watch out if your puppy gets a hold of it - rice everywhere. :)
customer_reviews.author: Orkiwi

customer_reviews.title: Radiation in bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and even heat, it's much better than use of rice or corn bags. Does it cause cancer? What doesn't anymore??
customer_reviews.author: Russell A. Comer

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot.
customer_reviews.text: This product is larger than my previous one (back warmer with straps). It is nice for anywhere on the front of your body, but the one I had was easier to position in the neck, shoulder, lower back region. I in fact bought the one w/ straps and use them both. I had previous one for over 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: mikey031

customer_reviews.title: ordered this as a replacement for one that developed a rip - just as good as thew original!
customer_reviews.text: i highly recommend this item for anyone needing a quick easy way to provide their join moist heat. It has worked for me for my neck and shoulder for over 5 years already and i am sure this replacement will last just as long. it is build with quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Monico

customer_reviews.title: A great foot warmer for cold beds
customer_reviews.text: While we initially purchased this item for relief of minor aches and pains. As it turns out the item makes a great foot warmer in a cold bed. As an aside, we tried multiple mattress warmers all of which failed within one winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Psych Doc

customer_reviews.title: This thing is really nice
customer_reviews.text: Throw it in the microwave heated up for a minute and a half or so depending on your microwave and you've got the nice moist heating pad for the next I don't know half hour or something Works great, very nice product
customer_reviews.author: daniel  caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great moist heat for arthritic pain
customer_reviews.text: I have used this every morning after getting up and drinking my coffee for my low back pain. It work amazing! The moist heat works so well and gets deeper than normal electric dry heating pads. I’ve used on arthritic hands, neck and shoulders. It helps me get going i the mornings. I won’t be without this amazing heating pad! I haven’t tried it cold because I have a large gel cooling pad when needed. I would recommend this pad to anyone needing heat for pain relief. I have arthritis and fibromyalgia and this really helps! I’ve had this one for about 3 years with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Trickey

customer_reviews.title: Moist heat!
customer_reviews.text: Bye bye electric heating pads! Pop it in microwave and use it. Chiropractor said moist heat for pain. It just works. Been using for at least 3 years. Had to order 2 new ones because we gave them to daughter who was in car accident.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy2

customer_reviews.title: Niiice So Far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good🤞didnt burn up "yet" like the other reviews...just did a "safe" I min I was 😎...stays warm for a good little while. Crook in my neck, pain in my back and leg much much better...just enough(to heal the pain) but not too much (to burn my skin;)
customer_reviews.author: Foxcye

customer_reviews.title: Seam Split Open
customer_reviews.text: After a little more than a month a seam split open and out came the beads. Into the garbage it went!
customer_reviews.author: Family Prime

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It heats up fast but doesn't hold the heat for a long time but long enough to help with the pain. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KarenKB

customer_reviews.title: So great for back pain
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from severe back pain and doctors have told me I need surgery but I am terrified of the eight hour surgery they describe. This heating pad takes the edge off my pain and I feel safer using this in bed instead of an electric heating pad. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Turgiss

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: I've had numerous heat pads for my low back pain and these are Great! I read other reviews and sympathized with some of the problems other people have had but it helps to know what other issues they've had. As for me, I put the pad in the microwave for 30 seconds and found the bottom heats a little more than the top so I flipped it over and did another 30 seconds. This was nice and warm but I gave it another 30 seconds and that seemed enough to give me some good heat. I like the design of the bag and the little time it takes to heat up. I plan on getting 1 or 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: TDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This product is my go to heating pain relief - one at home - one at work.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hamby

customer_reviews.title: Will help with pain!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have to help with aches and pains, easy to use and soothing to aching muscles. This is the 2nd one we have for our family
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Portable Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: I had used this pad for years and finally got around to buying a new one after the original got real dirty and icky. The only thing that I wish the company would do is to sell a cover for the pad to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: Not much to write home about here. 2 minutes in the Micro and you have a heat bag. Size is good for pretty much everything. Material seems to be good and the quality of the stitching is perfect
customer_reviews.author: G. Kwon Hoo

customer_reviews.title: Great for my husbands arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this heating pad. He said it gets really warm in the microwave and stays warm. Do not overheat this. If you overheat it you can damage it. The instructions say maximum time is 2 minutes 30 seconds. I'm assuming that is in an average (1100 watt) microwave. The care and use instructions are very clear. You can also scan the QR square, but It looks like they want to download an app with their advertising. UPDATE: My husband likes this so much that he suggested that I order a second one. We now have two of these. UPDATE: These get a funky odor that is tough to tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: L  Willis

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing it will get a lot of use ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my dog had knee surgery, and would need to be iced down 4x a day for 3 to 4 weeks. Found myself using it when I tripped walking through the baby gate I put up to keep him confined for recovery. Love this thing it will get a lot of use for so many more reasons. Hand washable, use over and over for icing (kept in freezer) or heat therapy (90 seconds in microwave).
customer_reviews.author: G. Nevius

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly moist heat in 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this heat pad! I think I probably warmed it up and used it on 10 different areas of my body the first day I got it. I have arthritis and the moist heat is heaven! And it only takes 2 minutes in the microwave. The pocket on the outside makes it easy to really warm fingers and toes. I'm thinking I could even use the pocket to warm up socks before I put them on in the morning. The fact that it heats in such a short time is the best feature. Only way to improve it would be to train it to jump in the microwave by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Do not get this pad wet with water prior to heating up in microwave
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product the very first time I used it but after the 3rd use I had it in microwave under 3 mins and when I took it out all the beeds/content from within spilled out all over my kitchen floor. What a mess to clean up! It could have partly been my fault as there was a wet spot on the pad that got over heated and had a scorch mark on it & busted open! I think if manufacturer would have mentioned not to get the pad wet then it could have prevented this. I would like a refund or new pad sent if possible.
customer_reviews.author: julie gilmore

customer_reviews.title: This is an effective and easy to use moist heat pad
customer_reviews.text: If you care about the fabric's look it might bother you that it pills up, but other than that I have no complaints on this very effective product. I use it for a hamstring injury so I like this size, which is only slightly smaller than an old style heating plug-in heating pad. I think it's great to have a consistent heat source that is not electric.
customer_reviews.author: joseph hessney

customer_reviews.title: I love it for my arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Thermalon Product. I love the glove aspect of it. It helps my painful hands. It is large enough to use on your back if needed. I use it everytime I have any aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: JYJ

customer_reviews.title: HEAT
customer_reviews.text: Throw in the microwave or leave in the fridge, this is great
customer_reviews.author: sam mireles

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for many areas of the body. I use it mostly for my elbow. The heat it emits feels like it goes deeper than a regular plug in heating pad which is exactly what I was looking for. The pocket on one side is also great for hands or feet. I do wish it was a bit more flexible but I would still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake G.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this moist heat pad to replace an old one which had "sprung" a leak of beads. I didn't need to use it immediately, but today, I did. It sprung a leak and beads went everywhere! Unfortunately, the return window has closed, so I will have to spend more money to get a replacement. Let the buyer beware on this one and check it out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy...poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not retain heat like other products I've used . After 3 weeks of use one of the bags broke open and spilled the inside "beads" all over the microwave and kitchen floor...we'll be vacuuming these up for days to come. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: brian a.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best, time and time again
customer_reviews.text: Soft yet durable fabric; channel stitched to allow comfortable placement and evenly distribute heat. Great design-there’s also an extra pocket of fabric on one side to use like a mit when picking it up, or if you’d like to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing "non-electric" source of heat therapy
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The heat is great comfort and really helps to relieve tension in order to exercise. Very healing to the affected areas of strain. Very versatile item for any area where heat needs to be applied. Best of all there are not electric wires hooked up next to me to provide the heat!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: These heating pads are great!
customer_reviews.text: These heating pads are life savers. My husband and I both use them, frequently. I take mine when I travel too because they are so convenient. If there's a microwave, I'm good.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen T. DeShong

customer_reviews.title: Trash, do not buy this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have got 2 of these. Both beeds were coming out. They fell apart. I got no refund. Both went in trash ! DO NOT BUY THIS !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: garysell

customer_reviews.title: Helpful with nerve pain and muscle cramp
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had ongoing nerve pain from shingles; this heat pad works well to alleviate the pain some. (Moist heat was recommended.) It also worked well for one of our dogs when they experienced a muscle cramp in one leg.
customer_reviews.author: william e young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: As a chronic pain patient, this hot pack is a life saver! Easy to use, comforting and I apply it to the area that is bothering me at that moment. 2 minutes in the microwave and it’s ready. No odor. Lasts a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: mj k

customer_reviews.title: Works great and conforms to body part affected.
customer_reviews.text: I heat mine for 90 seconds with 1250 watt microwave. Holds heat long enough for recommended therapy and does provide a moist heat. Suggest placing in trimmed down old pillowcase or similar covering to reduce soiling and avoid pilling of unit's fabric. Unit's fabric must be kept clean as stains, oil, and grease on cover will eventually cause hot spots which will lead to failure upon heating. Don't care? They you may get to experience a BOOM! and have a microwave full of little white balls to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: 3D Dennis

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for shoulder rehab and it works great! heat one minute then turn over and heat for another, feels sooooo good!
customer_reviews.author: SDFD Captain

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heating pad!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday and have been using it since. Instructions are spot on and it stays warm for a long time. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: denise j mazza

customer_reviews.title: Moist Heat Pad
customer_reviews.text: Thermalon’s microwave moist heat pad is a convenient way to relieve pain in your back, shoulder, or hip. It heats up in 2 minutes and can be easily molded for a comfortable fit. My only complaint is that it does not retain its heat very long.
customer_reviews.author: Linzie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used for herniated disc could of been a little bigger but worked great pop in micowave 145 seconds and lasted about 20 minutes Without leaving you wet like other moist heat does Love it Best one I found so far
customer_reviews.author: Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Heats up nicely in the microwave.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it on me. I bought 2 types heating pads for my 4-1/2# Chi who was having leg pain. She absolutely refused to get into the bed with a heating pad in it, sat on the outer edges of the bed! It does heat up nicely in the microwave. Was not too hot for her to be on.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom57

customer_reviews.title: If mom likes it, it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My senior citizen mother loves it and that's all that matters. She has a regular heating pad but it's not moist heat. This is moist heat and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one I bought someone in my family swiped the first one I really like it its perfect for my shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Helps sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is fantastic. Easy to use and really helps sore muscles or cramps. It is comforting and really helps when you are having a muscle issue.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps warm a long time..👍🏼..
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I am always cold so I use it on my lap and put my hands in the pocket..🤗..warms me (and comforts the arthritis in my hands)..!!️..
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper..

customer_reviews.title: Works for muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: Great for muscle pain. Using microwave for two minutes and making sure your hands are completely dry it should not break up. Have been using these for years. Always were clothes under the pad itself. In two minutes it can really heat up.
customer_reviews.author: sjsm

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay hot long enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a lava microwave heating pad that I loved but ruined by leaving it in the microwave too long. This is a sad substitute because it doesn't stay hot nearly as long and it is bulkier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eases pain
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis all thru my body and this heat pad sits perfectly on my shoulders. If I could I would have another for the other shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Works well but wish it was just a bit bigger so it wouldn’t slip off my shoulder. I like there’s no smell and stays heated longer. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good heating pad
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it heats up fast in the microwave. I love that it sets on my shoulder comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best heating pad I ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these for years. No other heating pad holds the heat as long. A new heating pad lasts me a couple years and I abuse them by overheating them. When it falls apart I put the beads in a sock and that works great too. I bought this one and didn't really need it but want an extra.

product_meta.title: Thermalon Microwave Activated Moist Heating Pad for Abdomen, Back and Hip, 9" x 12" with pocket
product_meta.description: The Thermalon Moist Heat Pad is made of a soft conforming material that conforms to the body and can be used anywhere for effective soothing pain relief. The Patented Hydro Pearl technology captures moisture from the atmosphere and when microwaved, the absorbed water is released as clean soothing moist heat. The therapy wrap will not support bacteria or fungi like grain or herbal products making them safer and easier to use than gel products. It is beneficial for both home, office and clinical use. The convenient design can be applied directly to the skin without a cover. Thermalon products are washable and reusable. With proper care, they will provide years of relief.
feature_bullets: NATURAL PAIN RELIEF: This therapeutic heat pad is designed to deliver a moist heat treatment that helps in relieving chronic pain, such as arthritis, muscle aches, tension and stress and for providing comfort

MOIST HEAT THERAPY: The unique microwave-activated heating pad conforms to the body and provides deep-penetrating, effective pain relief while maintaining consistent heat distribution. There are no wires, no waiting, no water and no mess. Just fast acting, natural pain relief.

SAFE REUSABLE MATERIAL: The heating wrap is 9" x 12". There are no dangerous wires like an electric heat pad. Will not support mold or bacterial growth like a grain-filled product. Features Hydro Pearl technology to deliver uniform moist heat. Can be washed and resused for years. Non toxic, and odor free
MULTIPURPOSE: Deep penetrating moist heat provides soothing relief when applied to the shoulders, back, hip, and abdomen. Use before exercise to warm up and after to ease discomfort
EASY TO USE: Simply microwave for moist heat therapy and apply directly to the affected area; The 9 x 12 Inches therapy wrap is easy for use at home, the office, or to carry when travelling
